"<u>15</u>1087'''1043-4.0''' ''Rev:1.0sp4''", "CA-F121" and "1532" :is silkscreened on the board in the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=2919285 FCC photos]. {{see also|Proware|TP-LINK}} *[https://wiki.openwrt.org/toh/tp-link/tl-wr1043nd ''TP-LINK TL-WR1043ND'' on '''OpenWrt''' wiki]
